Log.Description: Added Log page.
Fixed issue with Epic Boss calculator not giving appropriate damage bonus when armor matched on 2nd boss element only.
Forgestone Aegis now possible fusion result. Added Snowman's Nemesis regular stats.
Added Red Kaleidoscopic Armor.
Fixed Armor and Log ordering.
Fixed Red Kaleidoscopic Raiment name.
Added Red Kaleidoscopic Raiment regular stats.
Added Red Kaleidoscopic Raiment plus stats. Added Faerie Dragon's Nemesis Armor icon. Fixed various Nemesis armor plus stats.
Added Vesture of Frost and Frost's Nemesis.
Updated knight stat formula.
Updated player damage done/taken formulas.
Added Krampus's Mantle and Nemesis.
Fixed epic armor enhancement calculations (credit: DecuGamer).
Aegis of Sky Majesty and Beastmaster's Battlegear now possible fusion results (credit: DecuGamer).
Added Armorsmith and Fusion information to Enhancement calculators.
Updated level data based on spreadsheet provided by DecuGamer.
Updated Kerstman's Shroud stats. Added Bronze Chromatic Mantle, Druidic Platemail, Armor of Glacius.
Updated feed cost on Kaleidoscopic Raiments (credit: Jose Barreto).
Added Demon's Carapace, Drake Platemail, Fire Drake's Nemesis and Wrath Demon's Nemesis.
Added Wurmshroud Mantle, Sandstorm Platemail, Runic Robes.
Fixed bug with Epic Boss calculator when damage taken was calculated as 0.
Added Runic Robes regular stats.
Added Northerner's Battlegear to fusion results (credit: John Langskov).
Added Arborsteel Vanguard to fusion results (credit: John Langskov).
Added Green Kaleidoscopic Raiment and Typhoon Armor.
Added warning messages regarding updates and links to GitHub repository.
